coreAttributes.name: Aegis Shield
coreAttributes.description: A legendary shield once carried by a solitary swordsman.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] shield, ready to prove [npc.her] strength.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging [npc.her] shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to whack [npc2.name] on the [npc2.arm], which causes [npc2.herHim] to let out a surprised yelp!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid hit on [npc2.her] [npc2.arm]!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] shield, whacking it against [npc2.her] shoulder!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to whack [npc2.name] on the [npc2.arm], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] shield, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
